Hi Everyone,

My team is in search of Generalized Full-Stack Software Engineers – there are many open positions!!

In order to apply, you must have at least 2 years of Software Engineering experience* Please send your resumes in PDF to: brittanybehar@fb.com

Job Description: https://business.facebook.com/careers/jobs/a0I1H00000LJnlyUA...

Perks of Facebook: Attending Facebook’s Software Engineering Bootcamp, which provides 2 months of paid training plus one-on-one mentorship Facebook has a unique hiring process; following Bootcamp, you will get to choose which team you are most interested in joining Free organic locally grown breakfast, lunch & dinner

If you, or someone you know, may be interested, feel free to reach out to Brittany!
